title: Core Board Connection Error 5005 Fix
description: This video provides a solution for the Core Board Connection Error (5005) on the Robo Ice Cream machine, involving flipping the main power switch to turn the unit on, then running the automatic 'Repair' function via the System Settings menu.

title: Adjust Time Zone Settings (Balloon Bot)
description: Demonstrates how to access the settings menu on the Balloon Bot and adjust the internal time zone configuration for accurate scheduling.

title: Install Nayax Card Reader on Balloon-Bot
description: A step-by-step guide demonstrating the physical installation and wiring of the Nayax cashless payment system, followed by the necessary software configuration in the Basic Configuration menu.

title: Exit Balloon-Bot App to Access OS/Settings
description: This video shows the secure process for exiting the main Balloon-Bot application by using a technician password to access the system settings menu and ultimately the Android operating system (OS).

title: Balloon-Bot Internet (Wi-Fi) Connection Setup
description: This video details the process for connecting the Balloon-Bot machine to a Wi-Fi network by accessing the hidden Android OS settings, selecting the network, and then configuring the connection within the Basic Configuration menu.

title: Adjust Amperage on Cotton Candy PCB
description: This video demonstrates how to physically adjust the amperage (current flow) on the Cotton Candy machine's main PCB using a screwdriver to prevent the circuit breaker from tripping.

title: Fix Cotton Candy Arm Malfunction/Reset
description: This video details two methods to fix the robotic arm: first, manually resetting its position using the Device Testing menu, and second, running the automatic repair program via the System Settings menu.

title: Bill Acceptor Setup and USB Configuration
description: This video guides the user through accessing the Shopping Settings using the technician password to set the payment method to 'USB' for the bill acceptor, and verifies the physical cable connection for activation.

title: Burner Brush Cleaning Trick (Device Test)
description: This video shows how to use the 'Device Testing' menu to activate furnace rotation, allowing a technician to use a brush to manually clean the cotton candy sugar residue from the spinning burner head.

title: Clear Any Error Message (System Repair)
description: This video provides the quick, universal software solution for clearing any active error message on the Cotton Candy machine by running the 'Repair' function within the System Settings menu of the Management System.

title: Humidity Error Checklist & Humidifier Test
description: This video provides a three-part checklist for solving humidity errors, including checking the water bottle, cleaning the burner head and connecting cable, and manually testing the humidifier function via the Device Testing menu.

title: Nayax Card Reader Setup (Marshall/VPOS)
description: This video demonstrates the physical connection of the Nayax VPOS card reader, including the antenna and Marshall cabling (COM2), and the subsequent software setup via the Shopping Settings menu to select 'VPOS' as the payment method.

title: Fix Price Change Screen Stuck Loading
description: This video shows how to troubleshoot the issue where the 'Product Management' (price change) page fails to load by exiting the app and accessing the system's Wi-Fi settings to connect to the internet, which resolves the loading error.

title: Troubleshoot Screen Not Working (No Power)
description: This video guides the technician in checking the two physical connections for the screen—the HDMI cable and the power cable—and confirms that the monitor is receiving power by checking for a green light on the back panel.

title: Fix Stick Jam and Clear Error 4004
description: This video shows the procedure for clearing a stick jam (Error 4004) by manually removing a stuck cotton candy stick, followed by using the 'Repair' function in the System Settings to clear the machine's error state.

title: Fix Stuck on Initializing/Logo Screen
description: This video shows the resolution for the cotton candy machine being stuck on the initializing or logo screen by exiting the app, accessing the Android OS settings, and ensuring the machine is connected to a stable Wi-Fi network.

title: Robotic Arm Function Testing (Device Test)
description: This video guides the technician on how to use the 'Device Testing' menu to manually test the movement of the robotic arm (Arm 1 and Arm 2) by adjusting parameters like steps, speed, and direction to confirm its operation.

title: Testing Arm, Pole, and Stick Sensors
description: This video guides the technician through the Device Testing menu to check the status (HAVE/WITHOUT) of various sensors, including the Arm Pole Sensor and Stick Sensor, to diagnose if a part is working or needs replacement.

title: Robo Ice Cream F1/F2 Deep Cleaning Process
description: This video shows the full cleaning process for the Robo Ice Cream F1/F2 machine, including removing, cleaning, inspecting, and reassembling the front cover, plunger, and internal parts, along with using the screen's 'Cleaning' and 'Discharge' functions.
